alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 5:11PM PST until December 12 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Between 24 and 30 inches of new snow has been reported so far in the east slopes of the southern Sierra. Though the majority of the snow has fallen, additional snow showers can be expected overnight with areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible due to slick and snow packed roadways. Blowing snow may result in visibility reductions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County
